name: Jack Smack
description: Jack Smack by Ustad Seeds is an astonishingly powerful sativa. Known for its mind-warping rush of euphoria and heart-racing stimulation, Jack Smack is pure rocket fuel. Mind your dosage as this strain can easily overstimulate even the most seasoned consumer. Jack Smack is a cross of Jack Herer and Herijuana and exhibits a strong fuel aroma native to both parent strains. Enjoy this strain to combat lethargy and depression.
descriptionPlain: Jack Smack by Ustad Seeds is an astonishingly powerful sativa. Known for its mind-warping rush of euphoria and heart-racing stimulation, Jack Smack is pure rocket fuel. Mind your dosage as this strain can easily overstimulate even the most seasoned consumer. Jack Smack is a cross of Jack Herer and Herijuana and exhibits a strong fuel aroma native to both parent strains. Enjoy this strain to combat lethargy and depression.

highlightedReviews.text: I deliver mail and when I get home, I can be wiped out sometimes. And when I smoke after work I can pass out. Not on this!!! It's like the energy drink of Maryjane. It's amazing.
jack herer es una de mis cepas favoritas.. este cruce genético potencio increiblemente el sabor y fuerza del golpe.. ahora estará complicado seguir siendo fan sólo de jack herer
